verses.verse: And <WG2532> I saw <WG1492> <WG5627> another <WG243> mighty <WG2478> angel <WG32> come down <WG2597> <WG5723> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772>, clothed <WG4016> <WG5772> with a cloud <WG3507>: and <WG2532> a rainbow <WG2463> was upon <WG1909> his <WG846> head <WG2776>, and <WG2532> his <WG846> face <WG4383> was as it were <WG5613> the sun <WG2246>, and <WG2532> his <WG846> feet <WG4228> as <WG5613> pillars <WG4769> of fire <WG4442>:

And <WG2532> he had <WG2192> <WG5707> in <WG1722> his <WG846> hand <WG5495> a little book <WG974> open <WG455> <WG5772>: and <WG2532> he set <WG5087> <WG5656> his <WG846> right <WG1188> foot <WG4228> upon <WG1909> the sea <WG2281>, and <WG1161> his left <WG2176> foot on <WG1909> the earth <WG1093>,

And <WG2532> cried <WG2896> <WG5656> with a loud <WG3173> voice <WG5456>, as <WG5618> when a lion <WG3023> roareth <WG3455> <WG5736>: and <WG2532> when <WG3753> he had cried <WG2896> <WG5656>, seven <WG2033> thunders <WG1027> uttered <WG2980> <WG5656> their <WG1438> voices <WG5456>.

And <WG2532> when <WG3753> the seven <WG2033> thunders <WG1027> had uttered <WG2980> <WG5656> their <WG1438> voices <WG5456>, I was about <WG3195> <WG5707> to write <WG1125> <WG5721>: and <WG2532> I heard <WG191> <WG5656> a voice <WG5456> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772> saying <WG3004> <WG5723> unto me <WG3427>, Seal up <WG4972> <WG5657> those things which <WG3739> the seven <WG2033> thunders <WG1027> uttered <WG2980> <WG5656>, and <WG2532> write <WG1125> <WG5661> them <WG5023> not <WG3361>.

And <WG2532> the angel <WG32> which <WG3739> I saw <WG1492> <WG5627> stand <WG2476> <WG5761> upon <WG1909> the sea <WG2281> and <WG2532> upon <WG1909> the earth <WG1093> lifted up <WG142> <WG5656> his <WG846> hand <WG5495> to <WG1519> heaven <WG3772>,

And <WG2532> sware <WG3660> <WG5656> by <WG1722> him that liveth <WG2198> <WG5723> for <WG1519> ever <WG165> and ever <WG165>, who <WG3739> created <WG2936> <WG5656> heaven <WG3772>, and <WG2532> the things that therein are <WG1722> <WG846>, and <WG2532> the earth <WG1093>, and <WG2532> the things that therein are <WG1722> <WG846>, and <WG2532> the sea <WG2281>, and <WG2532> the things which are therein <WG1722> <WG846>, that <WG3754> there should be <WG2071> <WG5704> time <WG5550> no <WG3756> longer <WG2089>:

But <WG235> in <WG1722> the days <WG2250> of the voice <WG5456> of the seventh <WG1442> angel <WG32>, when <WG3752> he shall begin <WG3195> <WG5725> to sound <WG4537> <WG5721>, <WG2532> the mystery <WG3466> of 'Elohim <WG2316> should be finished <WG5055> <WG5686>, as <WG5613> he hath declared <WG2097> <WG5656> to his <WG1438> servants <WG1401> the prophets <WG4396>.

And <WG2532> the voice <WG5456> which <WG3739> I heard <WG191> <WG5656> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772> spake <WG2980> <WG5723> unto <WG3326> me <WG1700> again <WG3825>, and <WG2532> said <WG3004> <WG5723>, Go <WG5217> <WG5720> and take <WG2983> <WG5628> the little book <WG974> which <WG3588> is open <WG455> <WG5772> in <WG1722> the hand <WG5495> of the angel <WG32> which <WG3588> standeth <WG2476> <WG5761> upon <WG1909> the sea <WG2281> and <WG2532> upon <WG1909> the earth <WG1093>.

And <WG2532> I went <WG565> <WG5627> unto <WG4314> the angel <WG32>, and said <WG3004> <WG5723> unto him <WG846>, Give <WG1325> <WG5628> me <WG3427> the little book <WG974>. And <WG2532> he said <WG3004> <WG5719> unto me <WG3427>, Take <WG2983> <WG5628> it, and <WG2532> eat <WG2719> it <WG846> up <WG2719> <WG5628>; and it <WG2532> shall make <WG4087> thy <WG4675> belly <WG2836> bitter <WG4087> <WG5692>, but <WG235> it shall be <WG2071> <WG5704> in <WG1722> thy <WG4675> mouth <WG4750> sweet <WG1099> as <WG5613> honey <WG3192>.

And <WG2532> I took <WG2983> <WG5627> the little book <WG974> out of <WG1537> the angel's <WG32> hand <WG5495>, and <WG2532> ate <WG2719> it <WG846> up <WG2719> <WG5627>; and <WG2532> it was <WG2258> <WG5713> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> mouth <WG4750> sweet <WG1099> as <WG5613> honey <WG3192>: and <WG2532> as soon as <WG3753> I had eaten <WG5315> <WG5627> it <WG846>, my <WG3450> belly <WG2836> was bitter <WG4087> <WG5681>.

And <WG2532> he said <WG3004> <WG5719> unto me <WG3427>, Thou <WG4571> must <WG1163> <WG5748> prophesy <WG4395> <WG5658> again <WG3825> before <WG1909> many <WG4183> peoples <WG2992>, and <WG2532> nations <WG1484>, and <WG2532> tongues <WG1100>, and <WG2532> kings <WG935>.
